pr_title: Adding support for completing messages on receiver link. Moving logic out of azure-core-amqp. Adding more status codes

timeline.message: Adding missing AmqpResponseCode from .NET's AMQP library.
Using a processor rather than a sink that could be null.
Not throwing IllegalArgumentException when AMQP error condition not found. Being more versatile in parsing response codes.
Adding flexibility to decoding RequestResponse messages.
Move message deserialization and validation out of RequestResponseChannel. Just validate a matching message.
Fixing exceptions and adding a test.
Adding condition when it is actually a symbol.
Update message lock container to expire lock tokens.
Add methods for reading RequestResponse status codes and error messages.
Add comment for service bus session and unnamed session.
Adding support for keeping sessions open.
Adding support for settling messages on receive link.

timeline.bodyText: Changed from hex to dec values for readability.
timeline.author: conniey
timeline.diffHunk:

-    ACCEPTED(0xca),
+    ACCEPTED(202),

timeline.message: Waiting for work to be completed.
